text: This is a fun watch. It’s free when you have nothing to do the best thing as you could just walk inside this theatre and whatever is going on the show shows which are already displayed, so it’s like a decent quiet place for you to be by yourself and watch the movie.

It’s crazy how good the transit facilities in Changi Airport Terminal 3 is. There is a free cinema with free showings 24/7. The cinema is pretty well done too, with proper seats, fully dark room and a strong sound system. Good for spending time during long transits.

Good lots of entertainment n free access to all public
Based on the schedule can come over n watch their choice

This free 24/7 movie theater is on the second floor, there’s a daily movie schedule by the entrance. They offer kids as well as all kinds of movies. I like that they keep the sound low so people can sleep in the quiet, dark room on a comfortable seats.

Follow the signs to the theatre, it’s pretty clear or just ask any airport employees.

Love it. I stay here for transfer.
Sleeping, sleeping and sleeping.
